text: March 6, 2018 / 5:18 PM / Updated 21 minutes ago BRIEF-ConocoPhillips CEO Sees E&P Industry Trying To Attract Back Value Investors Reuters Staff March 6 (Reuters) - Ceraweek - ConocoPhillips: * CHIEF EXECUTIVE RYAN LANCE SAYS SHAREHOLDERS ARE ‘FRUSTRATED’ WITH THE E&P INDUSTRY * CEO SAYS E&P INDUSTRY DESTROYED VALUE OVER LAST 10-15 YEARS * CEO SAYS E&P INDUSTRY TRYING TO ATTRACT VALUE INVESTORS * CEO SAYS SHALE OUTPUT WILL TAKE UP RISING PART OF COMPANY’S PRODUCTION OVER TIME * CEO SAYS ‘GENERALLY SPEAKING’ THE GLOBAL LNG MARKET IS OVERSUPPLIED RIGHT NOW Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting By Ernest Scheyder)
